Package fr.insa.IA.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
fr.insa.IA.Player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
A Player of our simplified Belote. A player can be a human or the AI.
Author:
AUGEREAU Jeremy, GRAC Guilhem

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()
      Constructor of Player. Initialize hand, table, and secret, gives an id to the player, and increment nbPlayer by 1.

  • Method Details

    • resetNbPlayer

      public static void resetNbPlayer()
      Reset nbPlayer to 1. Notably used when creating a new game.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Score of the player. The score is calculated with the value (Carte.getHauteur()) of each card within a round this player has won.
      Returns:
      (int) score
